Detailed Description

The MDI widget we use in BibleTime.

Enhances QWorkspace.

Author:
The BibleTime Team

Member Function Documentation

const QString CMDIArea::currentApplicationCaption (    )  const
 

This works around a problem/limitation in QWorkspace.

QWorkspace sets every time the application caption on its on way. This confuses BibleTime - wrong captions are generated. This function returns the right caption (using the MDI child).

void CMDIArea::lookupInLexicon (  const QString &    text,
const QString &    module
)  [slot]
 

Look up the text in the module.

If the module has already a display window of it opne use it, otherwise create a new one.
